TubeMQ

日期 版本 备注 下载
2020-06-06 0.3.0 源码 [SRC] [PGP] [SHA512]
客户端 [TAR] [PGP] [SHA512]
服务端 [TAR] [PGP] [SHA512]

发版说明

新特性

  • [TUBEMQ-42] Add peer information about message received Major New Feature

改进

  • [TUBEMQ-7] Using StringBuilder instead of StringBuffer in BaseResult
  • [TUBEMQ-9] Remove some unnecessary code
  • [TUBEMQ-16] Correct BdbStoreService#isPrimaryNodeActived to BdbStoreService#isPrimaryNodeActive
  • [TUBEMQ-18] Correct TMaster#idGenerater to TMaster#idGenerator
  • [TUBEMQ-19] Correct parameter names to fit in camel case
  • [TUBEMQ-20] Correct DefaultLoadBalancer#balance parameter
  • [TUBEMQ-21] Change version number from x.y-SNAPSHOT to x.y.z-incubating-SNAPSHOT
  • [TUBEMQ-22] Correct ClientSubInfo#getTopicProcesser -> ClientSubInfo#getTopicProcessor
  • [TUBEMQ-23] Improve project README content introduction
  • [TUBEMQ-24] Add NOTICE and adjust LICENSE
  • [TUBEMQ-26] correct spelling (difftime-> diffTime)
  • [TUBEMQ-27] replace StringBuffer with StringBuilder
  • [TUBEMQ-28] ignore path error
  • [TUBEMQ-29] Change the package name to org.apache.tubemq.""
  • [TUBEMQ-33] refactor enum implement from annoymouse inner class
  • [TUBEMQ-38] Correct DefaultLoadBalancer#balance parameter
  • [TUBEMQ-39] Optimize the loadMessageStores() logic
  • [TUBEMQ-40] Optimize message disk store classes's logic
  • [TUBEMQ-43] Add DeletePolicy's value check
  • [TUBEMQ-44] Remove unnecessary synchronized definition of shutdown () function
  • [TUBEMQ-49] setTimeoutTime change to updTimeoutTime
  • [TUBEMQ-50] Replace fastjson to gson

Bug修复

  • [TUBEMQ-10] Fix Javadoc error
  • [TUBEMQ-14] Some compilation errors
  • [TUBEMQ-15] Correct typo in http_access_API_definition.md
  • [TUBEMQ-32] File path not match with package name in tubemq-client module
  • [TUBEMQ-35] check illegal package's field value
  • [TUBEMQ-36] Remove unnecessary removefirst() function printing
  • [TUBEMQ-37] Offset is set to 0 when Broker goes offline
  • [TUBEMQ-45] Check groupName with checkHostName function
  • [TUBEMQ-48] No timeout when setting consumer timeout
  • [TUBEMQ-59] Null pointer exception is thrown while constructing ConsumerConfig with MasterInfo
  • [TUBEMQ-62] consumed and set consumerConfig.setConsumeModel (0) for the first time
  • [TUBEMQ-66] TubeSingleSessionFactory shutdown bug
  • [TUBEMQ-85] There is NPE when creating PullConsumer with TubeSingleSessionFactory
  • [TUBEMQ-88] Broker does not take effect after the deletePolicy value is changed
  • [TUBEMQ-149] Some of the consumers stop consuming their corresponding partitions and never release the partition to others
  • [TUBEMQ-153] Some of the consumers stop consuming their corresponding partitions and never release the partition to others
  • [TUBEMQ-165] Remove unnecessary fiiles
